Stranato: Well. I don't really know of a way. But you could lock us in and =
question us for a while or something, run lie detector tests, or something,=
 I don't know.

ender, you're pissing me off.

tronghold: Lalalalala!

accept our apology and let us join your ranks, we won't go back to the Maxi=
mal City now.
